inputs.selection_motivation: Linking Trump's Federal Control of Washington, D.C. to the Federal Takeover of Washington D.C. highlights the overarching strategy of federal authority expansion, providing critical insights into governance dynamics during Trump's administration.
inputs.candidate_motivation: The selected topics are closely related to the political and economic implications of Trump's federal control over Washington, D.C., and include influences on governance, law enforcement, and economic policies.

proposed_link.motivation: Linking Trump's Federal Control of Washington, D.C. to the Federal Takeover of Washington D.C. highlights the overarching strategy of federal authority expansion, providing critical insights into governance dynamics during Trump's administration.
